about_the_game:
Brief:

You are inside a sublunar capsule, descending automatically into the Moon’s depths.

As you Descend, you will encounter various Anomalies, most of which are harmless. However, if you spot potentially Dangerous Anomalies, immediately change your route and submit a Report. 

How to Play? Just answer next question:

Have you noticed any potentially Dangerous Anomalies?

  • Yes --> Submit a report immediately and change your route.

  • No  --> Continue your Descent.

Features:

  • VHS Atmosphere  [real-time noise and visual distortion]

  • Dynamic Camera  [slight "shaky" camera effect for immersion]

  • Hidden Endings  [multiple finales based on your decisions]

Notes:

Playtime: 1-3 Hours

Inspired by projects like "Iron Lung" and "Exit 8".

name: Lunar Descent

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600 and above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB and above
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible or higher
  • VR Support: Not Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X and above
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT 8GB and above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible or higher
  • VR Support: Not Supported
